alert.note: Alert for Allen (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 8:53AM CST until February 14 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Sabine River Near Deweyville ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Kinder Mermentau River Near Mermentau Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Oberlin. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Sunday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CST Sunday was 14.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue falling to 11.2 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Calcasieu River Oberlin 13.0 14.2 Sun 8 am CST 13.5 12.8 12.2 &&
